verses.verse: <S%H1732>David<s%> therefore <S%H3212>departed<s%> <S%H4422>there<s%>, and escaped to the <S%H4631>cave<s%> <S%H5725>Adullam<s%>: and when his <S%H251>brothers<s%> and all his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3381>it<s%>, they went down there to him.

That all of you have <S%H7194>conspired<s%> against <S%H1540>me<s%>, and there is none that showed me that my <S%H1121>son<s%> has made a <S%H3772>covenant<s%> with the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%>, and there is none of you that is <S%H2470>sorry<s%> for <S%H1540>me<s%>, or showed unto me that my <S%H1121>son<s%> has stirred <S%H6965>up<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> against <S%H693>me<s%>, to lie in wait, as at this <S%H3117>day<s%>?

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7194>him<s%>, Why have you conspired against <S%H1121>me<s%>, you and the son of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%>, in that you have <S%H5414>given<s%> him <S%H3899>bread<s%>, and a <S%H2719>sword<s%>, and have <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> for <S%H6965>him<s%>, that he should rise against <S%H693>me<s%>, to lie in wait, as at this <S%H3117>day<s%>?

Then <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, And who is so <S%H539>faithful<s%> among all your <S%H5650>servants<s%> as <S%H1732>David<s%>, which is the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s son in <S%H2860>law<s%>, and <S%H5493>goes<s%> at your <S%H4928>bidding<s%>, and is <S%H3513>honorable<s%> in your <S%H1004>house<s%>?

Did I <S%H3117>then<s%> <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H7592>inquire<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> for <S%H2486>him<s%>? be it far from me: let not the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7760>impute<s%> any <S%H1697>thing<s%> unto his <S%H5650>servant<s%>, nor to all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H1>father<s%>: for your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H1697>nothing<s%> of all <S%H6996>this<s%>, less or <S%H1419>more<s%>.
And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, You shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>, <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%>, <S%H1>you<s%>, and all your father's <S%H1004>house<s%>.

But the servants of the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H14>would<s%> not put <S%H7971>forth<s%> their <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H6293>fall<s%> upon the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1673>Doeg<s%>, <S%H5437>Turn<s%> <S%H6293>you<s%>, and fall upon the <S%H3548>priests<s%>. And <S%H1673>Doeg<s%> the <S%H130>Edomite<s%> <S%H5437>turned<s%>, and he <S%H6293>fell<s%> upon the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and <S%H4191>killed<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H8084>eighty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H376>persons<s%> that did <S%H5375>wear<s%> a <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H646>ephod<s%>.

<S%H3427>Stay<s%> you with <S%H3372>me<s%>, fear <S%H1245>not<s%>: for he that seeks my <S%H5315>life<s%> <S%H1245>seeks<s%> your <S%H5315>life<s%>: but with me you shall be in <S%H4931>safeguard<s%>.
